ygData.subject: Re: Words but lack of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m an enchanter and i can help you with this (and thank you for your info on crocs) While hunting scarecrows in W Karanas I found an ABUNDANCE of words
ygData.messageBody:
>Crocs in Oasis seem to have many pages (enchanters).
>Gargoyles seem to have many runes (wizards).
>I have yet to find any creatures that drop many
>words (magicians and necromancers).

I'm an enchanter and i can help you with this (and thank you for your info
on crocs)

While hunting scarecrows in W Karanas I found an ABUNDANCE of words when i
looted a research item, the ratio seemed to be 5 words 2 pages 1 rune. But i
must warn you, you'll not find something dropped everytime, I killed ALOT of
scarcrows and found only 10 words (tyranny, imitation, spoken, and
materials).

Also, try in HighHold pass (or anywhere for that matter) by checking the
vendors. Alot of players find these things, have no clue what to do with
them, so just sell them.
